Issue.creator: edmoffatt
Issue.summary: Typescript contracts error if missing type in argument
Issue.description: {}} {{...}} {{}}} is fine, whilst {{public async createMyAsset(ctx: Context, myAssetId: string, assetName: string, *assetValue*): Promise {}} {{...}} {{}}} (with the "{{:string}}" missing after {{assetValue}}) will error. The error I get out in the console when debugging this in VS Code is: {{ 7/4/2019 11:11:32 AM INFO fabricvscodelocalfabric_peer0.org1.example.com|2019-07-04 10:11:32.702 UTC endorser SimulateProposal -> ERRO 139 mychannel 9f4f926e failed to invoke chaincode name:"myContract" , error: transaction returned with failure: Error: can't resolve reference #/components/schemas/Object from id #}} >
